verses.name: Mark 4:13
verses.text: And he said unto them, Know ye not this parable? and how then will ye know all parables?

verses.name: Mark 4:15
verses.text: And these are they by the way side, where the word is sown; but when they have heard, Satan cometh immediately, and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts.

verses.name: Mark 4:16
verses.text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground; who, when they have heard the word, immediately receive it with gladness;
